title: Ontology-Driven Personalized Learning Environment Design for Elementary Mathematics Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and geometry concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: An ontology-based personalized learning design course for prospective teachers and education aspirants to enhance elementary mathematics teaching competencies. Comprehensive evaluation of learnersâ€™ cognitive abilities and conceptual understanding through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify cognitive strategies required for solving math problems with 80% accuracy using a concept network (CogSkillNet).
Learners can design personalized learning paths based on ontology-driven feedback and revise them at least three times.
Learners can create a portfolio visualizing conceptual connections (using a smartphone app) through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
